mlr3temporal 0.1.0.9000
  • Reference

Forecasting Task (Regression)

Source: R/TaskRegrForecast.R
TaskRegrForecast.Rd

This task specializes Task and TaskSupervised for forecasting regression problems. The target column(s) are assumed to be numeric. The task_type is set to "regr" `.

Format

R6::R6Class object inheriting from Task/TaskSupervised/TaskForecast.

Construction

t = TaskRegrForecast$new(id, backend, target, date_col)

  • id :: character(1)
    Identifier for the task.

  • backend :: DataBackend
    Either a DataBackendLong, a object of class ts or a data.frame with specified date column

    or any object which is convertible to a DataBackend with as_data_backend(). E.g., a object of class dts will be converted to a DataBackendLong.

  • target :: character(n)
    Name of the target column(s).

Fields

All methods from TaskSupervised and TaskForecast.

Methods

See TaskSupervised and TaskForecast.

See also

seealso_task

Other Task: TaskForecast, mlr_tasks_airpassengers, mlr_tasks_petrol
